title: Wall design "Out and About"
img_alt: Wall design Out and About by Seiji Kimoto, hotel La Residence Saarbrücken
intro_text: 1992 Seiji Kimoto made a large-scale wall design with a total height of about 11 meters for the atrium of hotel La Résidence in downtown Saarbrücken between Bahnhofstrasse and Luisenbrücke. The atrium is used as bistro area by hotel guests and can be viewed from the restaurant and the conservatory. The handover took place in the courtyard of the hotel on January 7th in 1992. The art installation was part of an overall renovation and redesign of the hotel. Then Prime Minister of the Saarland, Oskar Lafontaine, spoke at the handover and re-opening ceremony of the hotel.
img2_alt: Ink paintings und wall relief by Seiji Kimoto at hotel La Residence Saarbrücken
unterschrift2: Ink paintings and wall relief at hotel La Résidence
